sen.j: 安然（あんねん、承和 (日本)8年（841年）? - 延喜15年（915年）?）は、平安時代前期の天台宗の僧。
sen.e: Annen (841? - 915?) was a Buddhist monk of Tendai Sect who was active in the early Heian Period.

sen.e: In his later years, he established Godai-in at Hieizan and concentrated in the study of Tendai Buddhism and Esoteric Buddhism.
